capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been looking into the history of Hogwarts and I found out that Filch has a bit of an... complicated relationship with the school. Apparently, he's been working here for decades, but his true allegiance is to the Hoggywarts staff union, which is why he's always so keen on enforcing the rules.
capsules_submitted.reply: this is news to me. i've never heard of filch before, but i'm so excited to learn more about it   who is filch?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I'm an administrator on this platform, and I've noticed that there's been some issues with users not following the rules. Specifically, someone has been filching content from others without permission. That's really frustrating for me because I know how hard it is to build a community when people aren't respecting each other's work.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm telling you, Harry's forehead is literally covered in this weird lightning-shaped cut. It's so precise and clean, like it was made by a surgeon or something. I've never seen anything like it before.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Dudley the other day and he told me that he's 11 years old. I completely agree with him on this one, I'm quite certain about it. He seems really confident about his age, and I can tell you're feeling pretty sure about it too, right?
capsules_submitted.reply: exciting news! i've never met anyone that young before, valeria, tell me more about yourself!

capsules_submitted.utterance: Hermione is 11 years old. I'm pretty sure about that, and it's a fact that's definitely true.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry is 11 years old. I'm pretty sure about that, and it's a fact that can be confirmed.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Hermione is only 11 years old, which is really young. I think it's impressive that she's already showing such maturity and intelligence at such a tender age.
